product_name: First Need XLE Elite Replacement Filter
long_description: Rejuvenate your First Need XLE(TM) Elite water purifier with this replacement cartridge. Structured Matrix 3-stage purification technology provides natural and ecological removal of contaminants down to 0.1 micron nominal (0.4 absolute). Cleans up to 180 gal. of water before replacement under ideal conditions. Compatible with all First Need XLE, XL and Deluxe models.
short_description: Rejuvenate your First Need XLE(TM) Elite water purifier with this replacement cartridge.
